{{cpp/memory/scoped_allocator_adaptor/title|allocate}}
{{cpp/memory/scoped_allocator_adaptor/navbar}}
{{dcl begin}}
{{dcl header|scoped_allocator}}
{{dcl|num=1|since=c++11|
pointer allocate( size_type n );
}}
{{dcl|num=2|since=c++11|
pointer allocate( size_type n, const_void_pointer hint );
}}
{{dcl end}}

用外层分配器分配未初始化存储。

@1@ 调用 {{c|std::allocator_traits&lt;OuterAlloc&gt;::allocate(outer_allocator(), n)}}。

@2@ 附带提供内存位置提示，通过调用 {{c|std::allocator_traits&lt;OuterAlloc&gt;::allocate(outer_allocator(), n, hint)}}。

===参数===
{{par begin}}
{{par|n|要分配存储的对象数}}
{{par|hint|指向临近内存位置的指针}}
{{par end}}

===返回值===
指向所分配存储的指针。

===参阅===

{{dsc inc|cpp/memory/allocator/dsc allocate}}
{{dsc inc|cpp/memory/allocator_traits/dsc allocate}}
{{dsc end}}
